unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, always swore by Ayurveda. Remember her knee pain, gone after that Kerala trip to Vaidyaratnam Ayurveda College? She'd massage sesame oil every day. It's slow, unlike those allopathic quick fixes. This Onam, she even made special Ayurvedic payasam. Maybe there's something to these ancient treatments. It’s worth a try, especially if you're near Kottayam. Cost her about Rs. 5000 plus travel (100 km from Ernakulam!).
